io.github.pulsebeat02.minecraftmedialibrary.http

Interface HttpDaemon

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HttpFileDaemonServer

    public interface HttpDaemon
    An interface to specify custom Http Daemon classes. Used within the MinecraftMediaLibrary as well.

    • Method Summary
